review_text: I had breakfast and happy hour in the hotel. In the breakfast, I always choose bread and noodles, the cheese. The forks and knives are very clean. The noodle soup is delicious.

Breakfast is the best in this hotel, it is better to sit at the extreme corner, as it becomes easier to access the live counter to get eggs, be careful while ordering "egg", please specify that you need "chicken" egg, else they may give you a duck or ostrich egg
